Field Detail

OBR_ENABLED

public static final String OBR_ENABLED
Indicates if OBR is enabled or not.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OBR_REPOSITORIES

public static final String OBR_REPOSITORIES
List of URIs of OBR repositories that are configured to be consulted while deploying bundles. The URIs can be URIs of repository xml file or they can point to directories. If they represent directories, then we build the repository.xml ourselves.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

HK2_REPOSITORIES

public static final String HK2_REPOSITORIES
List of HK2 module repository URIs. Currently, we only support directory URIs.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OBR_DEPLOYS_FRGAMENTS

public static final String OBR_DEPLOYS_FRGAMENTS
This boolean flag is used to indicate if OBR deploys fragment bundles for any given required bundle. Since fragments are not required resources of a bundle, it requires two pass resolution. Default is false.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OBR_DEPLOYS_OPTIONAL_REQUIREMENTS

public static final String OBR_DEPLOYS_OPTIONAL_REQUIREMENTS
This boolean flag is used to indicate if OBR deploys optional requirements. Default is false.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
